wikipedia_page.main: Maria Teresa Nuzzo (11 May 1851 in Valletta, Malta – 17 April 1923) was a Roman Catholic nun, founder of the religious institute Daughters of the Sacred Heart.

response: * April 17 – Madre Teresa Nuzzo, Maltese Roman Catholic nun and blessed (b. 1851)
* May 11 – Madre Teresa Nuzzo, Maltese nun, foundress of the Daughters of the Sacred Heart (d. 1923)
Daughters of the Sacred Heart is a Roman Catholic religious institute for women founded by Madre Teresa Nuzzo in 1903.
*Madre Teresa Nuzzo (1851–1923), Maltese Roman Catholic nun
